document_data.title: No Foolish Matter
document_data.debut: July 30, 2015 (Queen City Conquest/Fan Expo Canada/World RPG Fest)
document_data.mainbody:
'''''No Foolish Matter''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Rage of Demons|Rage of Demons]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on the hamlet of [[Hillpicket]], and a travelling carnival. It is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''Some of the hamlets outlying [[Hillsfar]] have been struck by an odd malady. Rumor has it a traveling carnival visited those hamlets before the disease struck. Does coincidence not equal causation or is something sinister afoot?''|}}
document_data.Summary:
The adventure begins with adventurers arriving in the hamlet of [[Hillpicket]]. However, when a strange carnival arrives with a reputation as the herald of some bizarre malady, they are compelled to investigate.

After battling through a deadly mirror maze, the adventurers confront a [[doppelganger]] masquerading as the carnival's owner. Upon defeating the creature, they release the trapped [[Jubal|Doctor Jubal]] and end the sickness.
